      Home Details for 5403 S Dorchester Ave

      180+ Days on Trulia
      72,160 views
      This classic Hyde Park 1880's greystone exudes vintage charm. The four bedroom home retains beautiful stained glass windows, a beveled glass door, fireplaces and a private backyard. The main level has a beautiful living room, a separate dining room and an open kitchen with a breakfast area. Perfectly located near schools, parks, shopping, and the University of Chicago campus.

      Contact Info

      Listing Provided by

      Diane Silverman, Urban Search -- Hyde ParkKenwood , (312) 337-2400

      Agent Phone: (312) 541-5971

      This Single-Family Home located at 5403 S Dorchester Ave, Chicago IL, 60615 is currently for sale and has been listed on Trulia for 677 days. This property is listed by Urban Search Realty for $550,000. 5403 S Dorchester Ave has 4 beds, 1 ½ bath, and approximately 1,951 square feet. The property has a lot size of 2,017 sqft and was built in 1885. 5403 S Dorchester Ave is in the Hyde Park neighborhood in Chicago and in ZIP Code 60615. The list price of $550,000 is 138% higher than the average list price of $231,075 for Hyde Park real estate, 131% higher than the average list price of $238,565 for 60615 real estate, and 53% higher than the average list price of $359,779 for Chicago, IL real estate. The price for this property is 184% higher than the average sales price of $194,000 for Hyde Park, 192% higher than the average sales price of $188,507 for 60615, and 109% higher than the average sales price of $263,732 for Chicago. The price per square foot for this property is $282, which is 15% higher than the average of $246 for Hyde Park, 32% higher than the average of $214 for 60615 and 52% higher than the average of $185 for Chicago.
